my first Chrome Extension - Geeklatte Viewer 0.1.1 Supporting tagline

my first Chrome Extension - Geeklatte Viewer 0.1.1

Yay! This is my first Chrome Extension that shows the latest Geeklatte photo!
https://github.com/yukop/sandbox/blob/master/study/chromeextensions/GeeklatteViewer.crx
Please download GeeklatteViewer.crx from "View Raw" link and drag-and-drop it on chrome://chrome/extensions/ !

わーい！最新のGeeklatteを表示するだけのExtensionできたよー
https://github.com/yukop/sandbox/blob/master/study/chromeextensions/GeeklatteViewer.crx
"View Raw" から GeeklatteViewer.crx をダウンロードして chrome://chrome/extensions/ にドラドロしてね！
